title: Eye of Leomander
description: Tammy Drinkwater is about to find out what is the Eye of Leomander. She stumbles upon this mysterious object when she and her brothers take refuge in a mysterious castle when the weather turns bad. Soon, she discovers it holds a power beyond the natural. However, she’s not the only person interested in the Eye. Suddenly, her brothers are taken prisoners. Tammy must save them, with the help of the magical inhabitants of the castle, before it’s too late.
author: Diane Louise Smith
